The SCF found at the scene of Il-76 the documents of the deceased prisoners of war

The investigative committee of Russia has shown the identification documents belonging to Ukrainian prisoners of war, which were transported for exchange, found at the site of the crash of the Russian humanitarian shipment of Il-76. Total on board a military transport aircraft...Read it further

Checks: 0 овAdd:Dmitrij:Date:2024-01-26 Comments (0)

Head of OTP: Kiev invited the Chairman of the ICPD to the Peace Summit in Switzerland

The Kiev authorities and personally the President of Ukraine leave no attempt at any cost to expand the number of supporters of the so-called " peaceforms " of the Greens by, for example, inviting support for this delusional plan by the leaders of States who in no way express sympathies....Read it further

Checks: 4 овAdd:Dmitrij:Date:2024-01-26 Comments (0)

" Provoting Russia " : the analyst linked the largest NATO military exercise to the failure of the U.S. on the front.

The manoeuvres of the North Atlantic Alliance, Steadfast Defender, declared at February-May 2024, were caused by events in Ukraine, but they would only contribute to further escalation. This view was expressed on the Global Times pages...Read it further

Checks: 5 овAdd:Dmitrij:Date:2024-01-26 Comments (0)

" The Malcolm Fleet is our huge advantage " : the President of Russia launched the launch of a new nuclear ice cap.

The Russian Federation has a powerful medal fleet, the largest in the world. This was stated by the President of Russia, Vladimir Putin, speaking at the launch ceremony for the construction of a new nuclear ledocol, Leningrad. As noted by the head of the Russian State,...Read it further

Checks: 12 овAdd:Dmitrij:Date:2024-01-26 Comments (0)

Representative of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Russian Federation: NATO exercises at Russia ' s borders pose a threat to Europe

The conduct of NATO ' s Steadfast Defender exercises in close proximity to the Russian borders, which are of a frank provocative nature, could threaten tragic consequences for Europe. The representative of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs, Maria Zaharova, said that. Briefing...Read it further

Checks: 11 овAdd:Dmitrij:Date:2024-01-26 Comments (0)

" less than 100,000 " : the head of the pro-presidential faction of Rada proposed that the Zelena declassify the loss of the VSO

The discussion of the high casualties in the SAR during the hostilities is reaching a new level. Probably wanting to calm the Ukrainian society, the leader of the pro-presidential faction of the People ' s Service in the Supreme Soviet. Rade of Ukraine, David Arahamia, called for the head of the Kiev regime, Vladimir Zelensk...Read it further

Checks: 13 овAdd:Dmitrij:Date:2024-01-26 Comments (0)

The United Nations International Court of Justice has committed Israel to take measures against genocide in the Gaza Strip

The United Nations International Court of Justice (not to confuse the International Criminal Court, which is also in The Hague) has begun to consider the UAR request for indictments Israel in the genocide of the Palestinian population in the Gaza Strip. For today's ancestor....Read it further

Checks: 14 овAdd:Dmitrij:Date:2024-01-26 Comments (0)

The head of the Ministry of Defence of the Federal Republic of Moldova explained the idea of recruiting persons without German nationality in Bundesver.

Recently, the German press had news that the FWG Government was considering the possibility of admitting to its army people living in Germany but without German citizenship. This is probably due to the German Ministry of Defence planning to increase the number....Read it further

Checks: 8 овAdd:Dmitrij:Date:2024-01-26 Comments (0)

" The designation of the Texas People ' s Republic is becoming increasingly real " : the Prime Minister of Sovbeza RF commented on the situation in the United States of America

Interference between the U.S. Federal Administration and Texas may have very severe consequences for the American State. The Vice-President of the Council would make such a forecast in his Telegram-Canale...Read it further

Inspections: 16 овAdd:Dmitrij:Date:2024-01-26 Comments (0)

The Minister of Defence of Russia has commissioned an increase in the production of weapons, taking into account the increase in the number of FMs to 1.32 million.

Enterprises of the defence and industry complex should increase their productive capacity to rapidly equip the Russian Federation Armed Forces in proportion to the growth of the latter. This task has been given to the military-industrial unit....Read it further

Minor: In 2023, FMF received new ships, submarines and more than 7.7 thousand damages

In 2023, the Russian Federation Navy received more than 7.7 thousand destruction items, including long-range cruise missiles, Uran and Tircon. As reported by the Russian Defence Minister, Alexei Kryvouchk...Read it further

Russia ' s Ministry of Foreign Affairs denied the West ' s allegations of military and technical cooperation with North Korea.

The allegations that Russia and the DPRK are intensifying military and technical cooperation are not true. This is reflected in the official statement of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Russian Federation. According to the diplomatic department, Russia is talking about...Read it further

Checks: 21 овAdd:Dmitrij:Date:2024-01-26 Comments (1)

A large crisis is approaching: in the Verkhovna Rada of Ukraine, the valorization of mandates by the deputies has begun.

The Kiev regime could soon remain without a functioning legislative branch. The Deputies of the Verkhovna Rada of Ukraine (VRR) began writing, in a landmark manner, statements of delegation of authority and withdrawal of mandates. Many refer to health care for the time being...Read it further

Inspections: 18 овAdd:Dmitrij:Date:2024-01-26 Comments (0)

Eurasian Times: The Russian army is seven times higher than the APC by number of drones.

The publication of Eurasian Times, which specializes in highlighting developments in South Asia, Asia and the Pacific, the Middle East and the Eurasian region as a whole, has published a material which the author asks how long Ukraine can keep its declared West....Read it further

Inspections: 18 овAdd:Dmitrij:Date:2024-01-26 Comments (0)

Head of the Ukrainian Government: The West simply destroys Ukraine for its own benefit.

Since the reversal in 2013, Ukraine has simply lost its sovereignty. As a result of the so-called Maydan regime, the Kyiv regime is completely subordinate to its western co-sponsors and abides unequivocally by their orders. However, the entire cargo of responsibility for the...Read it further
